TextView.android:text: Its counselling that attempts to treat a person's soul,mind and body by accessing an individual belief system. It helps to identify areas of conflict and possible mental health concerns that may arise in someone's life. People who believe in a guiding higher power may find spiritual therapy of help. This therapy involves communing with nature,meditation,music and other non-traditional therapeutic practices which are all employed to connect body and mind with the souland explore deepest part of oneself.
